mapper.select: SELECT order_id, in_carrier, in_carrier_no, in_freight, in_freight_currency, in_freight_pay, in_contact, in_phone, in_door_addr, in_door_appointment, in_door_remark, to_desc_logistics, to_desc_carrier, dest_contact, dest_tel, dest_phone, dest_email, dest_contry_code, dest_zip_code, dest_city, dest_company_name, dest_street, dest_address1, dest_address2, dest_address3, inner_org_id FROM in_order_attachment where order_id = #{id}

SELECT order_id, in_carrier, in_carrier_no, in_freight, in_freight_currency, in_freight_pay, in_contact, in_phone, in_door_addr, in_door_appointment, in_door_remark, to_desc_logistics, to_desc_carrier, dest_contact, dest_tel, dest_phone, dest_email, dest_contry_code, dest_zip_code, dest_city, dest_company_name, dest_street, dest_address1, dest_address2, dest_address3, inner_org_id FROM in_order_attachment where 1 = 1 order by id desc
